full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/22/2023 Capital of Saigon REPUBLIC OF VIET NAM 5th Precinct HQ. CIVIL STATUS No. 3678 EXCERPT FROM THE DEATH REGISTER Year of 1968 Full name of the deceased: Vo Thi Kha Occupation: Merchant Residence: 31 Nhi Qui Village, Dinh Tuong Date of birth : 1918 Place of birth: Cai Lay, Ben Tre Married/Single/Widowed Spouse's occupation: Residence: Father's full name: Vo Dy Minh Mother's full name: Ngo Thi Nhung Date of death: July 26, 1968 at 0400 hours Place of death: Phuoc Thien Hospital Made at July 26, 1968 Certified true excerpt from the original At Saigon on June 15, 1972 For the Chief of the 5th Precinct Signed: Nguyen Kim Be Administrative Secretary With seal The undersigned Hoa Thi Nguyen, a Vietnamese-born U. S. citizen, of the Family Reunification, Immigrat- ion & Naturalization Info Service Center at 10451 Bolsa Ave. Suite 210, Westminster, California 92683, being duly sworn according to law, deposes and says that she is thoroughly conversant with the English, French and Vietnamese languages and that she has ma- de the above translation of the attached Vietnamese document, and that it is an accurate and true copy to the best of her knowledge and belief. Hathiyan Signed: Hoa Thi Nguyen State of California County of Orange SS Subscribed and sworn to before me this 12th day of May 1986. Notaryo ENGER Public OFFICIAL SEAL DAO VAN NGUYEN NOTARY PUBLIC - CALIFORNIA ORANGE COUNTY My comm. expires JUN 17, 1988
